name: Knuddel's Quest
description:
Knuddel's Quest is a shareware puzzle-action-adventure game.

The object of the game is to get Knuddle, the hero who has been captured by aliens, out of the alien space-station. This is done by navigating a series of levels of increasing difficulty. The puzzles, tools and obstacles to be faced include monsters and their machines, mazes, tele-ports, bombs, tiles that disintegrate after use, tiles with spikes, etc.

The shareware version of the game comes with a tutorial and 15 levels, while the registered version has 100 levels.

shot.caption: Passwords can be used to skip ahead.
